sentences.sContent: They have to be able to pinpoint people in order to work, but satellite positioning does not work indoors.
sentences.sContent_eng: They have to be able to pinpoint people in order to work, but satellite positioning does not work indoors.
sentences.sCn: 因为这样的技术必须精确人的位置才可以工作，而目前卫星的定位系统还不能运行到室内。

synos.tran: 查明；精确地找到；准确描述
针尖；精确位置；极小之物
